product.name: VHC Brands Cotton Annie Buffalo Check Black Button Loop Kitchen Towel Set of 3, Hanging Kitchen Towel, Pleated, Bath, Kitchen, Annie Buffalo Check Collection, Rectangle 21x7, Country Black
product.description: Enhance your farmhouse and country-themed decor with the VHC Brands Cotton Annie Buffalo Check Black Button Loop Kitchen Towel Set of 3. These 21x7-inch hanging kitchen towels are a stylish addition to your kitchen or bath. Made with a durable twill weave and featuring the iconic buffalo check pattern, they offer both functionality and rustic charm. The button loop design allows for easy hanging wherever you need a hand towel, whether it's by the stove, oven, or in the bathroom. These textured towels are not only practical but also make for attractive decor accents. Their country black color adds a classic touch to your living space while providing a cozy, farmhouse-inspired feel. Crafted from high-quality cotton, these towels are highly absorbent and built to last. The VHC Brands Cotton Annie Buffalo Check Black Button Loop Kitchen Towel Set of 3 is an ideal choice for those who appreciate the timeless appeal of buffalo check patterns. Add a touch of country flair to your home with these versatile and stylish kitchen towels.
product.bullet_points:
• Farmhouse Charm: The VHC Brands Cotton Annie Buffalo Check Black Button Loop Kitchen Towel Set of 3 adds a touch of Farmhouse charm to your home. With its pleated design and classic Buffalo Check pattern, it's both stylish and practical.
• Convenient Hanging: These Rectangle 21x7-inch Hanging Kitchen Towels feature handy Button Loop closures, making them easy to hang on stove handles, hooks, or handles in the bathroom. They're always within reach when you need them.
• Textured Cotton: Crafted from textured cotton fabric with a Twill Weave, these towels are not just for decoration; they're designed for everyday use in the Kitchen and Bath. They maintain their quality and durability even with frequent use.
• Country Black Elegance: The Country Black color of the Annie Buffalo Check Collection adds a touch of classic elegance to your home decor. It's a versatile color that complements a variety of interior styles.
• Secure and Reliable: Equipped with secure buttons, these towels stay firmly in place. No more searching for your kitchen towel when you need it most.
